sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.apm" name="Application Portfolio Management" state="published" help="Application_Portfolio_Management" type="application" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true" license_model="producer" scope_name="sn_apm" scope_sys_id="65c1ca2cdbb2120091285411cf961963"> <description>Application portfolio management features.</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.sp_workbench_widgets"/> <import plugin="com.snc.financial_planning_pmo"/> <import plugin="com.snc.fiscal_calendar"/> <import plugin="com.snc.treemap"/> </requires> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Application portfolio management features.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Application_Portfolio_Management</help> <id>com.snc.apm</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Application Portfolio Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.apm/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.sp_workbench_widgets,com.snc.financial_planning_pmo,com.snc.fiscal_calendar,com.snc.treemap</requires> <scope>sn_apm</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.apm</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
